object.description: Crushed Adgana leaves. One dose is enough to increase your COMBAT SKILL by 6 points for the duration of a fight. It is highly addictive.
object.extraDescription: If you decide to take this potion prior to combat, as soon as the combat is resolved, you must pick a number from the Random Number Table. If the number you pick is 0 or 1, you have become addicted and your ENDURANCE score must be reduced permanently by 4 points. Should the opportunity to use a further dose of Adgana ever arise, its effect on that occasion will be only half that of the original dose (i.e. it will increase your COMBAT SKILL by 3 points instead of 6), and the risks of addiction are doubled (you will become addicted if you pick a 0, 1, 2, or 3 on the Random Number Table).
